It's like a big deli in Manhattan: If you want a sandwich, take a number. Your number is 16 or 18, because Sarah Palin and Mike Huckabee and all the rest of them already are in line in front of him. Still, a recent ABC News/Washington Post poll of potential GOP candidates shows none dominating the field. executive chairman,`` a lot of my time'' will be devoted to dealing with regulators and other government officials, Eric Schmidt said.`` We've got very complicated government issues,'' he said, adding that we move quickly, and we tend to be disruptive at scale. European Union officials opened a formal antitrust probe last year into Google search results, while in China the company opted to shut down its mainland search engine rather than censor results for user queries.
